```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
knitr::opts_knit$set(root.dir = normalizePath("../"))
library(tidyverse)
theme_set(theme_minimal())
library(plotly)
```

```{r}
vot <- read_csv("./vot/ChodroffGoldenWilson2019_vot_avg.csv")
```

```{r}
vot %>%
  spread(poa.broad, vot.mu) %>%
  plot_ly(x = ~coronal, y = ~dorsal, z = ~labial, type = "scatter3d", size = 1, color = ~vot.category)
```
